name: Raptor Pack - Beta
text: If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: Special Summon 1 "Raptor Hatchling Token" (Dinosaur/Earth/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. If you Synchro Summon a "Raptor Pack" monster while this card is in your GY: you can banish this card from your GY and target 1 Dinosaur-type or Reptile-type monster in your GY; Special Summon that monster. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Raptor Pack" monsters or Reptile-Type monsters. You can only use each effect of "Raptor Pack - Beta" once per turn.
